name: Love Kira
storyline:
You are a student at the Kara Talent Academy. An academy renowned for training many talents from all over the world.

Thanks to your efforts, you've managed to get a scholarship there and you're super excited to have stood out with a top grade.

Your excitement goes down the drain when you're late on the first day of school, making you meet your new classmates in a very unwelcome way. Your aim is to win their hearts while getting into a lot of trouble over the course of the year.
summary: Love Kira is an upcoming visual novel inspired by the independent VTuber group Kira Kara, filled with drama, romance, and lots of comedy with the talented "Kiras" from the esteemed Kara Talent Academy.
